section.name: WebDriver plugin
section.p: The WebDriver plugin allow to run your test in a real browser using Selenium 2/WebDriver API. The main advantage is the JavaScript support is perfectly identical to your target browser (of course). The main drawbacks are it is slooooooow compared to HtmlUnit and can't run on a headless server.
This plugin is still in development. In fact not all test cases works. Feel free to contribute

section.name: HowTo manage dependencies with Maven 2
section.p:
Just add the following dependency to your pom:
... <dependencies> ... <dependency> <groupId>net.sourceforge.jwebunit</groupId> <artifactId>jwebunit-webdriver-plugin</artifactId> <version>3.2</version> </dependency> ... </dependencies> ...
